DOC.brief_summary: The Cutaneous Lupus Erythematosus ( CLE ) database , establish 2006 , multi-site database University Pennsylvania University Texas Southwestern ( UTSW ) .
DOC.brief_title: Prevalence Clinical Severity Cutaneous Lupus Erythematosus
DOC.detailed_description: The database yield valuable information clinical insight pathophysiology , disease process , treatment quality life associate CLE . The CLE database incorporate CLASI ( Cutaneous Lupus Activity Severity Index ) , validate outcome measure disease responsiveness patient assessment tool , survey patient information help validate clinical course quality life patient CLE ( cutaneous lupus erythematosus ) . The CLE database lead publication significant study lupus clinical course , effect lupus Quality Life ( QoL ) , include effect photosensitivity QoL , effect first line medication . The CLE database ongoing resource enables clinician evaluate evolve clinical change , treatment modality patient response challenge disease .
DOC.criteria: Subjects meet criterion CLE , use Gilliam classification , and/or diagnosis systemic lupus erythematosus ( SLE ) , use American Rheumatism Association/American College Rheumatology criterion . Subjects must 18 year old . All subject meet criterion CLE . Subjects meet criterion CLE yet 18 year old
